title: NBA teams - number of Facebook fans 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Facebook fans in millions for 31 number of Nba Teams.
The Facebook fans in millions is highest at Nba Team NBA and lowest at Nba Team Washington Wizards.
The difference of Facebook fans in millions between the highest and lowest Nba Team is 36.5.
